full_summary:
## Construction Project - Deschambault Lake, SK
### Solicitation Number: M5000-23-3788/A

The Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) invites qualified contractors to submit a tender for a construction project at Deschambault Lake, SK. The project involves the construction of a new modular building, modular living quarters, storage building, and site development on an existing greenfield.

### Project Overview
The proposal includes the following services:

* Construction of a 812 sq. m single-storey wood-framed modular building, including office space, garage, storage areas, and contained use areas
* Construction of a 255 sq. m single-storey wood-framed modular living quarters building on the same site
* High-quality and durable material construction, including interior finishes, millwork, glazing, and doors
* Construction of associated structural, mechanical, and electrical systems
* Construction of a 75 sq. m detached storage building
* Development of the site, including installation of underground services, rock blasting, grading, landscaping, signage, lighting, and granular surfacing
* Installation of a self-contained solar photovoltaic system

### Tender Requirements
Tenderers must provide a complete set of documents, including a Request for Qualification and a financial bid on the project. The project deadline is December 31, 2025.

### Evaluation Criteria
The tender will be evaluated based on mandatory requirements, including security and integrity measures. The RCMP has adopted the Integrity Regime administered by Public Services and Procurement Canada.

### Procurement Details
The following procurement details apply:

* Notice Type: Invitation to Qualify
* Procurement Method: Competitive - Open Bidding
* Regions of Delivery: Canada, Saskatchewan
* Contracting Entity: Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP)
* End User Entities: None

### Contact Information
To obtain more information or to submit a tender, contact Sandra Robinson at the following address:

Address: 6th Floor, 10065 Jasper Avenue NW, Edmonton, Alberta T5J 3B1
Phone: (780) 670-8626
Email: [sandra.robinson@rcmp-grc.gc.ca](mailto:sandra.robinson@rcmp-grc.gc.ca)
Fax: 780-454-4523

### Attachment
The following attachments are provided for reference:

* Sample - Integrity Form (English and French)
* Sample - ITT M5000-23-3788 SK (English)
